products.title: Infusion Solar Pale Blue Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar pale blue pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0021 fabric colour: pale blue headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.
